snippets.text:
#!/bin/bash
# $1
# Autor: luiz.sena88
# Data: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)

set -euo pipefail

# Cores
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

main() {
    $2
}

main "$@"

snippets.name: sh-log-functions
sh-check-command
snippets.text:
if ! command -v $1 &>/dev/null; then
    echo "Erro: $1 não encontrado" >&2
    exit 1
fi
